songs.title: Anything
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Carlos]
Baby if it's dark outside
That's because I stole the stars tonight
I'll put them on a priceless chain, yeah
Crazy as it sounds had to give you something
To show you I'd do anything

[Pre-Chorus: Kendall & Carlos]
Anything you want (want)
Anything you need (need)
Everything you are (are)
Is everything to me
Everything you say (say)
Everything you do (do)
I'm a hold it down for you

[Chorus]
Girl there's some things I can't explain
Like how you have blown me away
There's some things we just can't choose
Like how I would do, I would do, I would do

[Kendall & Logan]
Anything for you (Do anything) [x2]

[Verse 2: Kendall]
I know all the things people say
I know, sticks and stones may break your bones
But you still feel the pain
All they've got is jealousy
And we've got everything, let the world attack
Go to war for ya girl I got your back

[Pre-Chorus: Kendall & Carlos]

[Chorus]

[Kendall & Logan]
Anything for you (Do anything) [x2]

[Chorus: Kendall & Carlos]

[Outro: Logan]
Do anything [x4]
